content: Is there anything special I need to do to install Zulip on a Terminal Server (Server08 R2)?

interesting! The folks that would know most about this seem to be offline, but I expect they'll answer when they return
@Joseph Tropea can you explain your question in more detail? Are you asking about running the desktop or terminal app on Terminal Server, or the Zulip server itself?
@Tim Abbott . I just want to put the client on the Terminal Server for my remote users. I am managing Zulip on a separate server.
@Joseph Tropea OK. I'm not aware of anything special required for putting the Zulip desktop app there; you should try it and let us know if you run into any trouble.
Thanks Tim. I will give it a try and let you know
yes. sorry. I will try it and let you know
